title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, list, pull, delete models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama; pip install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven Central artifact lets JVM apps chat with local models.

title: chatd-ai/chatd
summary: Minimal Electron desktop chat client that talks to Ollama; no cloud, fully local.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple Retrieval-Augmented-Generation example using Ollama + SentenceTransformers + Chroma.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial npm CLI wrapper that adds interactive REPL and conversation history to Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via Ollama models; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server forwarding channel messages to Ollama and streaming replies.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings and CLI to interact with Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama with session memory and model selector.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows (chat, generate, embed).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with NuGet package supporting chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama; go get github.com/ollama-go/ollama.
